text:
="preserve">The Philips Odyssey series is a series of home video game consoles. They were marketed by Philips. The Philips Odyssey series is the successor to the Magnavox Odyssey series.
History.
Magnavox made video game consoles. But in 1974, Magnavox became a subsidiary of Philips. Philips continued making consoles. These consoles are known as the Philips Odyssey series.
